TITLE: Installing Stable Version of Couchbase Go SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the latest stable version of the Couchbase Go SDK using the go get command.
SOURCE: https://github.com/couchbase/gocb/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
go get github.com/couchbase/gocb/v2@latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests for Couchbase Go SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to run both unit and integration test suites for the Couchbase Go SDK with race detection enabled.
SOURCE: https://github.com/couchbase/gocb/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
go test -race ./...
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Linting for Couchbase Go SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute linting on the codebase using golangci-lint through the make utility.
SOURCE: https://github.com/couchbase/gocb/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make lint
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Development Version of Couchbase Go SDK
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the latest development version of the Couchbase Go SDK from the master branch.
SOURCE: https://github.com/couchbase/gocb/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
go get github.com/couchbase/gocb/v2@master
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Git Repository with Gerrit for Couchbase SDK
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to clone the gocb repository and set up Gerrit remote for code review submissions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/couchbase/gocb/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/couchbase/gocb.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Gerrit Remote and Commit Hook
DESCRIPTION: Commands to configure the Gerrit remote connection and install the required commit-msg hook for Change-Id generation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/couchbase/gocb/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git remote add gerrit ssh://${USERNAME}@review.couchbase.org:29418/gocb
$ scp -P 29418 ${USERNAME}@review.couchbase.org:hooks/commit-msg .git/hooks
$ chmod a+x .git/hooks/commit-msg
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Pushing Changes to Gerrit for Review
DESCRIPTION: Command to push local changes to Gerrit for code review, targeting the master branch.
SOURCE: https://github.com/couchbase/gocb/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git push gerrit HEAD:refs/for/master
```
